titles.title: Ste. Genevieve National Historic Site Establishment Act of 2016
To establish the Ste. Genevieve National Historic Site in the State of Missouri, and for other purposes.
Ste. Genevieve National Historic Site Establishment Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Ste. Genevieve National Historic Site Establishment Act of 2016
This bill establishes the Ste. Genevieve National Historic Site in Missouri as a unit of the National Park System.
Interior may acquire, by donation, purchase, or exchange, any land or interest in land located within the boundary of the Historic Site or any nationally significant property identified in the special resource study that is within the Ste. Genevieve Historic District National Historic Landmark.
